Package org.openpnp.model

Class GeometricArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Area
      • org.openpnp.model.GeometricArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class GeometricArea
extends java.awt.geom.Area
    Extends java.awt.geom.Area to be serializable and have length units
